title: Morning standup
content:
Mike: I'm going to build out the API rate limiting this week. We've had a few customers hit our limits and the error messages are confusing.

Sarah: That sounds important. Do you have a design doc?

Mike: Yeah, I'll share it today. Planning to add exponential backoff suggestions in the error response and a dashboard widget showing usage.

Sarah: Perfect, let me know if you need frontend help with the dashboard.
